    • getVirtualBoard

      public VirtualBoard getVirtualBoard()
      This method is used to get the virtual board, it'll be used to send updates when the status changes. It is intended to pass the direct reference, so that the controller can easily manage all virtual views all together.
      Returns:
      virtualBoard virtual board object
